üî• Japan is back on crypto traders‚Äô radar.  Markets are watching the Bank of Japan this week, as another rate hike could ripple through risk assets - including BTC and $XRP .  üìå Here‚Äôs why it matters. For years, Japan‚Äôs ultra-low rates powered the yen carry trade: borrow cheap yen, deploy capital into stocks, crypto, and anything with yield. When rates go up, that trade gets unwound - and risk assets feel it.  We‚Äôve seen this movie before. In March 2024, when Japan exited negative rates, Bitcoin stayed calm at first‚Ä¶ then dropped nearly $20K over the following weeks. Similar patterns followed the July 2024 and January 2025 hikes, with $BTC  sliding 10‚Äì30% before finding a floor.üìä  So if volatility picks up, it wouldn‚Äôt be a shock. Sometimes the macro move hits crypto after the headlines - just as bears finish their coffee   This week isn‚Äôt about panic. It‚Äôs about awareness.  #BTC Price Analysis#   #Bitcoin Price Prediction: What is Bitcoins next move?#
